00036 //
00037 enum  MosaicClass_t {
00038   MCLASS_NONE, // unset
00039   MCLASS_n10,  // -1.0 // 1
00040   MCLASS_n07,          // 2
00041   MCLASS_n05,          // 3
00042   MCLASS_n03,          // 4
00043   MCLASS_00,           // 5
00044   MCLASS_p03,          // 6
00045   MCLASS_p05,          // 7
00046   MCLASS_p07,          // 8
00047   MCLASS_p10,  // +1.0
00048   MCLASS__LAST,
00049 };
00050 
00051 /// negate the class (MCLASS_pXX -> MCLASS_nXX)
00052 MosaicClass_t MosaicClassNeg(MosaicClass_t val);
00053 float         MosaicClassToFloat(MosaicClass_t val);
